The loss was largely due to a rough outing from starting pitcher Hurston Waldrep, who gave up 8 earned runs in just 4.2 innings. Key highlights from the game include: 1. Eli White hit a home run and drove in 2 runs, providing some offense for the Braves. 2. Ronald Acuña Jr. contributed with 2 hits, including a home run, and added an RBI. 3. The Astros' offense was relentless, out-hitting the Braves 13 to 5, which played a significant role in their victory.
